response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your daily life or work experience. Given its high quality and unique features, I think it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $125. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to experience something truly special. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 125}
